title: The Asset Allocator: Baker Hughes Capturing The Carbon-Capture Opportunity
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: At a time when oil majors are facing increasing pressure to reduce greenhouse-gas emissions, a key question for investors concerns not which future technologies will prevail but who is helping these companies get rid of their methane right now. This podcast (6:40) argues that Baker Hughes’s solutions are performing right now in an area of rising regulatory scrutiny and hence growing market importance. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
